Event Generators (pyrex.generation)¶

Module for particle (neutrino) generators.

Generators are responsible for the input of events into the simulation.

ShadowGenerator(dx, dy, dz, energy[, …]) Class to generate neutrino vertices with Earth shadowing.
ListGenerator(events[, loop]) Class to generate neutrino events from a list.
FileGenerator(files[, interaction_model]) Class to generate neutrino events from numpy file(s).

PyREx

A Python package for simulation of neutrinos and radio antennas in ice. Version 1.8.0
